name: Hill king (IncogKneeToe)
description:
Some dirty peasants have climbed to the top of your hill and are trying to ruin your relaxing day and destroy your throne.

Goal:
Try for as long as possible to prevent you or your throne from running out of hearts.
Your score is the amount of enemies you've defeated.

Enemies:
As time passes the game will get slightly harder.
Ranged enemies will only come after you.
Others will either go only after you or after your throne.

movement - WASD

"Point to which side you want to use your sword or shield"
swing your sword - Left mouse button (can not be used while using shield)
use your shield - Right mouse button

Known isue:
Sometimes the player won't turn around

Not the final version and probably won't have time for it.
Still might add sound tho.
